interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Keratin Secrets Do It Yourself Home Keratin System
Review Date: 2021/04/27
Store: Keratin Secrets
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 4.21 x 3.9 inches; 2.87 Pounds'}
Review Text: I tried this on thick curly 3c hair. The results were quite decent. You first wash your hair with the pre-treatment shampoo to clarify the hair and remove dirt and oils. At this point, make sure to detangle the hair well and section it into smaller parts so that you can apply the keratin treatment. The hair should be 80% towel dried. You then comb in the keratin treatment to each section of hair. I recommend wearing gloves. Allow it time to process and then blow dry and finish with a flat iron. The hair came out quite silky and smooth, but it began to revert into fluffiness as the day went on. Adding a bit of hair oil helped to restrain the humidity. For an at home kit, it is decent, but it is not as strong as salon treatments.
Review Title: OK
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Was I given the wrong product? This wig looks awful. The lace is terrible and highly visible because for some reason they sewed two different types of lace together at the front of the wig. This is the worst wig I have ever seen. It is completely unwearable. The hair quality is good and I will be taking this wig apart to save the hair. This wig was constructed wrong and is overpriced. I do not recommend this product.
Worst Wig Ever
John Frieda Detox and Repair Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Nourishing Avocado Oil and Green Tea, 8.45 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
John Frieda
['John Frieda Detox and Repair Shampoo and Conditioner set removes product build up and revitalizes dry and stressed hair. Detox and Repair moisturizes and cleanses damaged hair and leaves hair visibly healthy and repaired. With antioxidant rich green tea and nourishing avocado oil. Your hair is exposed to many daily challenges that could make it look stressed and lifeless. Styling, product build up, and environmental influences can strain hair and can reduce the effect of caring ingredients. With antioxidant rich green tea and nourishing avocado oil, John Frieda Detox and Repair removes product build up and revitalizes hair immediately. The result: Repaired and healthy looking hair with silky shine. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.']

Great

For an at home kit, it is decent, but it is not as strong as salon treatments.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to prioritize practicality and aesthetics in personal care products, with an emphasis on innovative solutions that encourage creative expression.

- **Recent Acquisition and Experience:** Following a disappointing experience with a previous purchase, the user maintains high expectations for quality and value in grooming products.

- **Hair Type Focus:** The user is committed to wavy textures while exploring options for straight hair, indicating a desire for versatility in their hair care routine.

- **Nail Care Interest:** Their engagement with nail care remains strong, bolstered by recent purchases of grooming tools focused on efficiency and skin safety.

- **New Hair Care Addition:** The user's recent integration of a home keratin treatment reflects their interest in achieving sleek and smooth results. They noted effective cleansing and the importance of hair preparation, enhancing their appreciation for products that deliver tangible benefits while remaining mindful of potential challenges, such as humidity.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user exhibits a discerning approach to product reviews, highlighting quality, performance, and aesthetic appeal. Their evaluations demonstrate a clear standard for effectiveness in their grooming experiences.

- **Overall Trend:** The user underscores a commitment to stylish, effective, and sustainable solutions across hair, nail, and eye care. Their ongoing pursuit of quality products aligns with a preference for versatile grooming experiences and thoughtful evaluations of product performance.
